name: Crystal Quest (itch)
description:
Derick loves crystals and one day he discovers an island with 7 beautiful crystals so he decides to go on a journey to collect all 7! Jump your way through this retro-style platformer to obtain 7 crystals located in 7 levels! 7 may seem like not much but our levels are very gamboyey which makes it ok! This is also a game for #GBJAM5 so it may look and act even more gameboyey! Anyways enjoy!

So this is my first time entering a game Jam so any feedback would be gr8!

All graphics and coding were done by me in Game Maker Studio and Paint.Net.
